channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Coupling and Cohesion: The Two Principles for Effective Architecture 】耦合和凝聚力：有效体系结构的两个原则
item.description: 【Every large system that spirals out of control starts the same way: small, functional, and deceptively simple.】每个大型失控的大型系统都以相同的方式开始：小型，功能性和看似简单。

item.title: 【EP158: How to Learn API Development】EP158：如何学习API开发
item.description: 【Learning how to develop APIs is an important skill for modern-day developers.】学习如何开发API是现代开发人员的重要技能。

item.title: 【How Airbnb Powers Personalization With 1M Events Per Second】Airbnb如何使用每秒100万事件为个性化提供个性化功能
item.description: 【Personalizing an experience meaningfully, especially across a product as broad as Airbnb, requires understanding users while they interact with the app.】有意义地对体验进行个性化，尤其是在像Airbnb一样广泛的产品中，需要在用户与应用程序互动时了解。

item.title: 【How DoorDash’s In-House Search Engine Achieved a 50% Drop in Latency】Doordash的内部搜索引擎如何达到50％的潜伏期
item.description: 【🚀Faster mobile releases with automated QA (Sponsored)】＆＃128640;使用自动质量检查（赞助）更快的移动版本

item.title: 【EP157: How to Learn Backend Development?】EP157：如何学习后端发展？
item.description: 【Backend Development requires knowledge of multiple aspects. Here’s a mind map of what all things a developer should learn:】后端发展需要多个方面的知识。这是开发人员应该学到的所有知识的思维图：

item.title: 【EP159: The Data Engineering Roadmap】EP159：数据工程路线图
item.description: 【Data engineering has become the backbone of effective data analysis. It involves managing, processing, and optimizing data to derive actionable insights.】数据工程已成为有效数据分析的骨干。它涉及管理，处理和优化数据以获得可行的见解。

item.title: 【How YouTube Supports Billions of Users with MySQL and Vitess】YouTube如何为数十亿个用户提供MySQL和Vitess
item.description: 【As YouTube’s popularity soared, so did the complexity of its backend. This happens because every video upload, comment, like, and view creates more data.】随着YouTube的受欢迎程度飙升，其后端的复杂性也是如此。发生这种情况是因为每个视频上传，评论，喜欢和查看都会创建更多数据。

item.title: 【How Netflix Orchestrates Millions of Workflow Jobs with Maestro】Netflix如何与大师协调数百万的工作流程
item.description: 【WorkOS + MCP: Authentication for AI Agents (Sponsored)】Workos + MCP：AI代理的身份验证（赞助）

item.title: 【OOP Design Patterns and Anti-Patterns: What Works and What Fails】OOP设计模式和反式模式：什么有效和失败
item.description: 【Writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code sounds easy as a requirement, but is a constant challenge when developing real-world applications.】编写干净，可维护和可扩展的代码听起来很容易，但是在开发真实世界应用程序时，始终是一个持续的挑战。

item.title: 【Domain-Driven Design (DDD) Demystified】域驱动设计（DDD）脱神秘
item.description: 【Most software doesn’t break because of syntax errors or flawed if-else logic.】大多数软件不会因为语法错误而破坏或存在缺陷，如果else逻辑有缺陷。
